images.alt:
NOTE ON AI TOOLS:
This assignment is designed to be done without the assistance of Al tools such as ChatGPT, Google Gemini, MS Copilot, etc. You will not receive the learning benefits of the assignment if you rely on machines to read and write for you, and, to those of us who read and write about literature for a living, machine-generated essays tend to come across like the textual equivalent of dead eyes. It's not impressive, but it is creepy.

NOTE ON AI TOOLS:
This assignment is designed to be done without the assistance of Al tools such as ChatGPT, Google Gemini, MS Copilot, etc. You will not receive the learning benefits of the assignment if you rely on machines to read and write for you, and, to those of us who read and write about literature for a living, machine-generated essays tend to come across like the textual equivalent of dead eyes. It's not impressive, but it is creepy.

record.text: I redesigned the essay assignment for my intro-level literature class. My goal was not to AI-proof anything, but to make space for students who want to learn what we're teaching, and to make the assessment process as not annoying as possible for the TAs. drive.google.com/file/d/195wl...

When we survey parents and community members, we ask about a list of priorities school districts should pursue.  The top four are almost always, in some order, “high quality staff,” “CTE,” “life skills,” and “mental health services.”

We ask about AI every time. Nobody wants it.

value.text:
In-depth reporting by @vauhinivara.bsky.social on how AI tools are being integrated into K-12 despite a wide range of deep concerns and little research to support the push. 

My takeaway: teachers who are resisting when districts and ed institutions are selling kids out to tech cos. need support.

record.text: Still thinking about this, from @vauhinivara.bsky.social's piece about AI in K-12. An AI can of course do all kinds of things that are still worth doing but also, I'm trying to imagine the world in which high school kids only ever do the things that an AI can't do. Even if your goal was /1

images.alt: When I sat down with the head of the high school, Chris Locke, he told me the school had a name for the contrarian beliefs it encourages in students: “spiky points of view.” For example, “one of Alpha’s biggest spiky points of view is that you don’t need a teacher,” he said. Chloe Belvin, the guide who’d previously worked as a corporate lawyer, chimed in: “It’s funny, because in a traditional school you get in trouble if you’re using AI, and here you get in trouble if you’re not.” She added, “The starting point of every conversation I have with a kid is, ‘Is there an AI that can do this, so that you’re not spending your time on it?’”

马斯克的xAI新推出的Grok Code Fast 1，简直是开发者的福音！它速度超快，响应延迟比GPT-5还低，成本更是只有竞品的1/10。支持256K超长上下文窗口，能处理整个代码库

还具备代理式编码能力，可自主规划执行路径。现在已在GitHub Copilot、Cursor等平台限时免费开放 docs.x.ai/docs/guides/...

腾讯ARC实验室在2025年9月开源AudioStory，一款基于大语言模型的长篇叙事音频生成模型

它能把复杂文本指令转化为连贯音频叙事，解决了传统模型在长内容生成时的“碎片化”问题。支持视频配音、音频续写、有声书创作等场景

通过端到端训练与解耦桥接机制，实现语义与音效精准匹配，生成音频达到专业水准，感兴趣的伙伴看一下论文 arxiv.org/pdf/2508.20088

最近字节跳动Seed团队联合斯坦福、复旦、普林斯顿，共同发布FutureX动态评测基准，专为评估AI智能体对未来事件的预测能力

每周它从全球195个高质量信息源筛选500个预测任务，经济、科技、体育等领域全覆盖，还分了四个难度层级。最新排行榜显示，Grok-4表现最佳，但和人类专家比，整体准确率还是差了点

这个基准测试，绝对是AI发展路上的新挑战，感兴趣的伙伴可以看一下论文 ￼ arxiv.org/pdf/2508.11987

external.description:
Ya disponible el nuevo mini PC **GEEKOM A9 Max**, una máquina con potentes especificaciones gracias al procesador que nos ofrece y con un buen número de puertos.

Un pequeño PC de la marca GEEKOM destaca por su diseño con cuerpo de aluminio. Como motor tenemos soldado en la placa base el potente procesador **AMD** **Ryzen AI 9 HX 370** de doce núcleos y dieciséis hilos que llega hasta los 5.1 GHz, que incluyen un **núcleo para IA** hasta los **80 TOPS** de potencia. En el apartado gráfico disponemos de la **GPU Radeon 890M** que trabaja hasta los 2.9 GHz, un chip con la nueva arquitectura **RDNA 3.5** que nos ofrece un rendimiento elevado en juegos exigentes.

Destacar en su configuración la presencia de dos versátiles puertos **USB4** (hasta 40 Gbps), donde incluso podemos conectar una tarjeta gráfica externa con una caja.

## Especificaciones del GEEKOM A9 Max

Este pequeño ordenador**** integra un procesador **AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370** fabricado por TSMC en 4nm. Un chip con 12 núcleos, 4 Potentes Zen 5 y otros 8 Zen 5C de bajo consumo, manejando 16 hilos y llegando hasta los 5,1 GHz, contamos con un **núcleo IA hasta 80 TOPS** como asistencia. En el apartado gráfico disponemos de una GPU **Radeon 890M** integrada con tecnología de nueva generación **RDNA 3.5** , dispone de 16 CU y llega hasta los 2900 MHz. Un procesador que permite mover cualquier app de diseño exigente y jugar a muchos títulos AAA en una calidad decente ajustando la configuración.

En el apartado de RAM tenemos contamos **32 GB DDR5 5600 MHz** en Dual Channel. Por defecto trae montado un SSD **M.2 2280 NVMe Pcie 4.0×4** con tamaño de **2 TB** y que da otra ranura libre, podemos ampliar hasta los 8 TB.

### Otras características destacables

Como conectividad inalámbrica encontramos un adaptador **Wifi 7** y**Bluetooth 5.4**. Como conectores, en el frontal de la caja tenemos dos puertos USB 3.2, jack de audio de 3,5 mm y un botón de power. En la parte trasera tenemos un conector de **Ethernet 2.5G** , dos puertos **USB 4 Type-C** con salida de vídeo, un conector USB 3.2, un USB 2.0, dos salidas de vídeo **HDMI 2.0** con soporte **4K@60 HDR** lo que nos da la posibilidad de conectar hasta **4 pantallas simultáneas**.

Este mini PC incluye como sistema **Windows 11 PRO** aunque podemos instalar Linux. Se incluye alimentador externo y un pequeño soporte VESA para colgarlo detrás de nuestro monitor o TV.

### Precio y donde comprar

  * El mini PC **GEEKOM A9 Max** se puede comprar en **Amazon **por un precio de **999 €** con envío incluido.
external.title: GEEKOM A9 Max, nuevo mini PC con procesador AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370

record.text:
"was 2000 25 years ago

To answer your question about whether 2000 was 25 years ago, I need to calculate the difference between the current year and the year 2000.

The current date is September 3, 2025.

2025 - 2000 = 25 years

Yes, the year 2000 was exactly 25 years ago from 2025."
Claude Sonnet 4 var mer utförlig:

När jag frågar Gemini 2.5 Pro via Copilot så svarar den korrekt. Google kanske borde uppgradera?

"was 2000 25 years ago

Yes, as of 2025, the year 2000 was 25 years ago."
I needed to tell the LLM *twice* that scores were still incorrect. The calculations were just three numbers that needed to be added to a correct total. I guess we still need to teach kids some math.

If I would have believed the results an A.I. LLM spit back to me (in my case it was microsoft copilot chat) I would have entered incorrect scores for my students. Only after telling the LLM that the calculations were done incorrectly did I get the right scores. A spreadsheet with a human just works.

New schoolyear is about to begin. Anything you want me and my students to build for you? Could be smallish web apps. I have several ideas each year but it's always more fun to build something unexpected.

NASA協力の4脚登攀ロボット「Loris」、DIG制御で宇宙探査の新時代へーイノベトピア
innovatopia.jp/robot/robot-... 

Lorisの最大の技術的ブレークスルーは、昆虫の登攀行動にヒントを得た「Directed Inward Grasping（DIG）」という制御戦略にあります。これは対角線上に配置された脚のグリッパーが同時に表面を掴み、内向きの張力を維持することで安定性を確保する手法です。この仕組みにより、わずか3.2kgという軽量でありながら、地球の重力下で不規則な垂直岩面の登攀を実現しています。

external.description: カーネギーメロン大学の研究チームが、生体模倣技術を駆使した4脚登攀ロボット「Loris」を開発した。マイクロスパイングリッパーとDIG制御システムにより、重量3.2kgながら垂直な不規則岩面の登攀に成功。NASAとの共同開発で宇宙探査分野での活用が期待されている。
external.title: NASA協力の4脚登攀ロボット「Loris」、DIG制御で宇宙探査の新時代へ - イノベトピア

Yield curve 2025: inversion → steepening. Bills ~4.1%, 10Y ~4.3%, 30Y ~5.0; 2s/10s >0. Fed easing; long end held by term premium, supply/QT. Modest growth, slow disinflation. Favor belly, upgrade quality; 2s/10s & 5s/30s steepeners. Watch term premium, breakevens, auctions, Fed.

Is XRP A Meme Coin? Analyst Reveals How Whales Are Playing The Game

XRP is currently trading below $3 after facing repeated rejections at the $2.8 resistance level. Analyst MadWhale suggests XRP might be exhibiting behavior similar to meme coins, driven by crowd psychol…

#crypto #fearandgreed #xrp

external.description: XRP is currently trading below $3 after facing repeated rejections at the $2.8 resistance level. Analyst MadWhale suggests XRP might be exhibiting behavior similar to meme coins, driven by crowd psychology and whale activity. This cycle begins with excitement and greed, followed by social proof amplifying hype. During this peak, whales offload their holdings, leading to a sharp correction. Small traders panic sell, and whales then buy back at lower prices, restarting the cycle. MadWhale describes whales as "masters of illusion," manipulating prices to their advantage. This strategy creates a retail fear and greed cycle, often leaving smaller traders with losses. Technical indicators like Volume Profile, RSI, and the Fear and Greed Index can reveal these whale activities. XRP is trading within a descending channel formed since July 19, with repeated rejections around $3 indicating lower highs. MadWhale's chart analysis projects a potential 14% decline to a support level around $2.40. Any upward movement would first need to overcome the $3 resistance. At the time of writing, XRP is trading slightly up at $2.80.
external.title: Is XRP A Meme Coin? Analyst Reveals How Whales Are Playing The Game

Did you know? 🥔✈️
Boeing once filled an entire airplane with sacks of potatoes to test its in-flight Wi-Fi. Potatoes absorb and reflect wireless signals almost the same way humans do, making them the perfect stand-ins for passengers.

Who knew potatoes could fly too? 😂 #FunFact #AviationTrivia

images.alt:
Did you know? 🥔✈️
Boeing once filled an entire airplane with sacks of potatoes to test its in-flight Wi-Fi. Potatoes absorb and reflect wireless signals almost the same way humans do, making them the perfect stand-ins for passengers.

The project was even given a brilliant name: SPUDS (Synthetic Personnel Using Dielectric Substitution). Who knew potatoes could be frequent flyers too?

external.description:
(Reuters) -Investment manager Nuveen’s private debt arm has partnered with Hunter Point Capital and Temasek, the company said on Wednesday, as it furthers its push into the fast-growing slice of corporate financing market.
Under the agreement, Hunter Point and Temasek will make minority investments in Nuveen Private Capital. Singapore-based Temasek will also provide long-term capital commitments to Nuveen’s new and existing strategies.
Persistently high market volatility and interest rates have constrained the lending capacities of banks, creating a funding gap that is now being filled by private credit providers.
These financial firms provide more flexible loan terms, repayment schedules and collateral requirements than traditional entities like banks.
Nuveen Private Capital said its investment strategy, leadership or operations will remain unaffected after the transaction, with its parent firm continuing to maintain majority ownership.
With $87 billion under management today, Nuveen Private Capital finances deals across the U.S. and Europe via its Churchill and Arcmont Asset Management arms.
Nuveen has some $1.3 trillion under management and is a unit of New York-based Teachers Insurance and Annuity Association, one of the largest and oldest U.S. retirement financial services organizations. The Chicago-based firm had acquired a controlling stake in Arcmont Asset Management in 2022 in a deal worth over $1 billion.
3rd party Ad. Not an offer or recommendation by Investing.com. See disclosure here or remove ads.
BofA Securities served as financial advisor to Nuveen.

I feel more for Frers here but side more with Derrida - although perhaps not with Derrida's interpretation of himself, if that's what he really meant. In terms of the Human-Machine essay, to be "never fully present" is not not to be present. A glass half filled is not fully full but not fully empty.

Perhaps the brass memorial plaque inscription is as trite as that ridiculed by Socrates/Plato in Phaedrus, but to sit there and experience their view on another day, not through their eyes but with our eyes where theirs were, means something - and the words yoke us, the living and dead, together.

I searched for something and came upon this by Lars Frers: journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1... (preprint at www.researchgate.net/publication/...). Not sure where I sit here - although I've been to Mullion Cove and sat at many of those benches on the South West Coast Path.
